remarks: This is the proof for the last equation in the proof of the derivative calculated in [Juillerat] p. 12, just after equation *(6) . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
etransclem32.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
etransclem32.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t S ) ) $.
etransclem32.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. NN ) $.
etransclem32.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN0 ) $.
etransclem32.f $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> ( ( x ^ ( P - 1 ) ) x. prod_ j e. ( 1 ... M ) ( ( x - j ) ^ P ) ) ) $.
etransclem32.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
etransclem32.ngt $e |- ( ph -> ( ( M x. P ) + ( P - 1 ) ) < N ) $.
etransclem32.h $e |- H = ( j e. ( 0 ... M ) |-> ( x e. X |-> ( ( x - j ) ^ if ( j = 0 , ( P - 1 ) , P ) ) ) ) $.
etransclem32 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S Dn F ) ` N ) = ( x e. X |-> 0 ) ) $.
$d H j x $.
$d M j $.
$d M j x $.
$d N j $.
$d N j x $.
$d P j x $.
$d S j x $.
$d S j x $.
$d X j x $.
$d X j x $.
$d j ph x $.
